product_name: Merrell Moab Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: The men's Merrell Moab Mid waterproof light hikers work hard on all your warm- and wet-weather active endeavors. Waterproof Dura leather and nylon ventilator mesh uppers offer ample breathability, flexibility and support for long-lasting performance. Mesh padded tongues protect insteps against lace pressure without inhibiting breathability. Waterproof, seam-sealed inner booties offer a new level of breathability while retaining complete waterproof protection. Linings are treated with AEGIS(R) antimicrobial technology to keep odors at bay. Synthetic leather toe bumpers and heel wraps protect your feet from bumps and abrasions. Removable, anatomic footbeds add cushioning for improved comfort. Full-length, compression-molded EVA midsoles supply cushioning and support for all-day wear. Air-cushioned heels provide extra shock absorption under heels and stabilize your foot strike. Molded nylon arch shanks increase stability on uneven terrain. Vibram(R) Multi-Sport(TM) outsoles with TC5+ rubber and 5mm lugs deliver reliable traction on both wet and dry surfaces.
short_description: The men's Merrell Moab Mid waterproof light hikers work hard on all your warm- and wet-weather active endeavors.
